message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'd love to make a deal with you.
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to accept it. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we try 135?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about we try $130?
I understand you're still a bit tight on budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we try 132?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. I'm still a bit away from my target, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about we try $129?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we try 131?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. How about we try $130 again?
